data.Name: Theodora Kamenidis
data.staff_bio: Theodora has extensive experience working in rehabilitation centers and schools with diverse client groups. Theodora became a Certified Employment Services Provider (CESP) and obtained the ACRE national certification in 2016 and became an APSE member in 2018.

BA, English Language Studies & Intercultural Studies, Anglia Ruskin University, U.K.
BA, Art, University of Massachusetts Boston
